name: multimarket
description: Application de gestion multi-supermarchÃ©s : gestion des stocks, ventes, utilisateurs, fournisseurs et bien plus. ConÃ§ue pour centraliser et optimiser l'activitÃ© de plusieurs points de vente.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=always
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --linux --publish=always
scripts.build:mac: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --mac --publish=always
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=always
scripts.build-only: vite build --mode production && vite build --mode electron || exit 0
scripts.electron:build-win-publish: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=always
scripts.electron:build-clean: npm run clean && npm run electron:build-win-publish
scripts.electron:publish: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=always
scripts.clean:win: if exist release rmdir /s /q release && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.analyze: npm run build-only && echo 'Bundle analysis saved to dist/stats.html'
scripts.electron:build-optimized: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.electron:build-win-optimized: npm run clean && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never
scripts.performance:check: npm run build-only && npm run analyze
scripts.release:local: npm run clean && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never
scripts.release:github: npm run clean && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=always
scripts.release:draft: npm run clean && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build-only && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=onTagOrDraft
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:github
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:github
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:github
scripts.prerelease: npm run type-check && npm run lint
